holidays.name: World Goth Day
holidays.description: A celebration of goth culture, music, fashion, and the unique artistic expression embraced by goths worldwide.
holidays.origin: Started in 2009 by a UK-based radio presenter as a way to dispel myths and celebrate goth subculture.
holidays.funFact: World Goth Day was inspired by an online event called 'Goth Day' created by radio show host Lee Meadows to showcase goth music and style.

holidays.name: National Buy a Musical Instrument Day
holidays.description: A perfect day to encourage people to pick up an instrument, embrace music, and maybe start a new hobby or band!
holidays.origin: Created by music enthusiasts to promote learning instruments and the joy of making music.
holidays.funFact: Sales of musical instruments often spike on this day as people are inspired to play for the first time or rekindle old passions.

holidays.name: World Turtle Day
holidays.description: A day dedicated to raising awareness about turtles and tortoises, their habitats, and the conservation efforts needed to protect them.
holidays.origin: Founded in 2000 by American Tortoise Rescue to help draw attention to these ancient reptiles.
holidays.funFact: Turtles have been around for over 200 million years ‚Äî they outlived the dinosaurs by a long shot!

holidays.name: National Maritime Day (India)
holidays.description: A tribute to India's maritime heritage, honoring the brave sailors and the naval history of the country.
holidays.origin: Commemorates the maiden voyage of the first Indian merchant ship, SS Loyalty, in 1919.
holidays.funFact: India‚Äôs maritime history dates back thousands of years, with ancient trade routes connecting it to the rest of the world.
